summary: Website update for INOVICS to add a new CONTROL™ Framework landing page with specified content/sections, plus navigation entry points from the homepage and main menu, including lead-gen CTAs and a qualifying form.
architectural_notes: New landing page requires global navigation update (main menu) and homepage CTA/link update to route to CONTROL™ Framework page.
Lead-gen form includes dropdown fields (Industry, Annual Revenue Range) and should support mid-page placement plus a strong final CTA section.

existing_features.title: Create a new standalone page for “The CONTROL™ Framework” containing the exact sections and user-provided English copy: Hero (headline/subheadline/supporting line + CTA “Book a Founder Strategy Call”), Section 1 (Why a Framework), Section 2 (detailed CONTROL™ steps with bullets and “Outcome:” lines), Section 3 (What this means for you), Section 4 (Who this is for), Section 5 (Lead generation form positioned mid-page + strong final CTA), and a Final Section with closing line + CTA “Book a Founder Strategy Call”.
Add a “Read more” (or equivalent) link on the homepage that navigates to the new CONTROL™ Framework page.
Add a main menu navigation entry that navigates to the new CONTROL™ Framework page, while preserving existing homepage section navigation behavior for other menu items.

Implement the CONTROL™ Framework lead-generation form with the exact fields specified: First Name, Last Name, Company Name, Industry (dropdown), Annual Revenue Range (dropdown: ₹5–10 Cr / ₹10–25 Cr / ₹25–50 Cr / 50+ Cr), Biggest Operational Challenge (short text area), Work Email, Mobile Number; CTA button text “Request Blueprint Review”; and display the small text under the button: “We work with a limited number of businesses each quarter.”
On submitting the lead-generation form, capture the submission and provide a clear success state to the user without navigating away unexpectedly.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a new “CONTROL™ Framework” page for INOVICS with provided hero, sections (Why/Framework breakdown/Benefits/Who it’s for), final CTA, and overall page content structure.
Add a “Read more” (or equivalent) link on the homepage that navigates to the new CONTROL™ Framework page.
Add a main menu/navigation link to the CONTROL™ Framework page.

Add a lead-generation form on the CONTROL™ Framework page with premium/qualifying fields (name, company, industry dropdown, revenue range dropdown, challenge textarea, email, mobile) and CTAs (Request Blueprint Review; Book a Founder Strategy Call).
